org.wildfly.security.auth.server

Interface Scoped

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlexibleIdentityAssociation, SecurityIdentity

    public interface Scoped
    An identity configuration which can be applied on a scoped basis.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
